Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Very good restaurant serving dishes from their own vegetable garden. Wine pairings are good and also include some Dutch wines. We had both vegetarian and the normal menu. It is interesting to see what they are able to do without using any fish/meat in a dish.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Worst experience we had in a Michelin star restaurant so far. Unexperienced waiters, no sense menu… ( we have been in meny * and worked as a chefs in meny of them as well…) …

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Love this restaurant. We always buy the box that they sell in Christmas and we really enjoy it (it is becoming a tradition after two years of lockdown). The ingredients are incredibly fresh and the flavors are amazing. Really a must if you are in Amsterdam.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: We have been quite disappointed. The food does not provide any surprises, sometimes really bland. A course was not great at all with no balance in the tastes (did not even eat half of it). The wine is a real issue with the cart indicating …

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: We went the night before their August vacation started. Fixed course with wine pairings. The food was excellent with good serving appearance as you would expect from a Michelin *. They were absolutely all about Dutch cuisine, so they are …

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: My sister is vegetarian and we were hungry I thought to give this restaurant another try. This time I came with the knowledge that it will be a vegetable-focused meal. …

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: This restaurant was an over-the-top gastronomic WOW!! The serving dishes even had their own artistic presentation. This definitely brought dining to a new level.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Beautiful presentation and creative dishes. Vegetables are a highlight and the care given to each ingredient is amazing. The overall experience is really good and worth the price tag.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Very creative and wonderful dishes with all fresh ingredients from the garden next to the restaurant. Well deserved a star restaurant.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Super nice and sophisticated food, beautiful and comfortable place ;)

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Fantastic lunch here with great vegetables from the garden, friendly service, and wine selection. Definitely worthy of a Michelin star.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Food presentation was impressive, the colour, arrangement, texture, the wide selection of vegetables used to create their dishes from their very own garden around the corner. Quite novel. Portions were small, on the expensive side, quite bland.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: It is a bit expensive for a foreigner, but the taste was amazing. Check out the 5 course menu in the photos attached.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Urban gardening restaurant in Amsterdam- highly recommended - top service and food - lunchmenue.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Incredible cuisine, impeccable service. Vegetables as good as they get. I can still almost taste some of the flavours.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Thank you to Luc and his team for an outstanding lunch and experience at Bolenius.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Crystal cruise experience.  Entire experience was mediocre. Owner was nice and professional and friendly. The entire price tag from the ship was outrageous and the food was not to my liking. I just can't get excited about pickled carrots or …

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: We went for a quick lunch last week, as close to our office and planned a quick reservation given very seasoned colleague's recommendations. And boy, it just delighted us to the core... fresh, organic veggies drinkin their own garden were …

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Dining doesn't get much better. Great and complex flavors, top notch presentation and wine pairings that are original in choice. The very efficient and friendly service takes all of that to an even higher level. …

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: The food was amazing, every dish blew my mind. The service definitly matches that. Like a well choreographed dance but always open to change if you have some special request.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Super Nice, great food and superb service

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: High level cuisine, great service and nice selection of wines. Be aware that the 7 course meal might seem doable because of the small portions but it requires a robust appetite.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Excellent restaurant offering a nicely creative menu based on premium products. We've tried the 5 courses tasting menu - a great experience with roasted langoustines and homegrown vegetables. Highly recommended if you happen to be in this eccentric part of the city.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Absolutely fantastic experience. The food was great in taste and presentation. The staff is knowledgeable about their dishes and drinks and the overall feeling is truly luxureous.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Hidden gem in the middle of the financial district. Both presentation and food quality to a high standard. Ambiance is private so you Can have a good business conversation  during lunch.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Bolenius serves modern Dutch food. Modern <European country> often just means fine dining with no discernable difference. But there is something particularly Dutch about bolenius. Distinctive, strong, possibly blunt flavors that combine harmoniously. Subtle use of spice. It was surprisingly good and surprisingly exciting.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Perfect place for a business lunch. Super healthy options. Fresh produce from their own garden. Great wines. Modern, white interior. Friendly Dutch speaking staff.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Can't wait to return.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Innovative place with great healthy dishes. Many of the ingredients proceed from their garden and all ingredients are sourced locally. Recommend to go all the way through the menu including desserts.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: My wife and I dined at Bolenius tonight - we were so disappointed that we left after 5 of the 7 courses of the tasting menu. Things started well enough with amuse bouche and the first course from the kitchen garden - but then things …

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Awesome, creative experience - and of course good food

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Super restaurant using the art of mixing different ingredients to the best. A paradise for those with an adventurous palate. Excellent service.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Wow, the food was excellent, each course well paced so we were never left waiting too long, but long enough that each could stand on its own merits. Service was beyond reproach, I will definitely be going back for more.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Interesting and while sometimes a bit overly conceptual. Food is good. Service is impeccable. Certainly the best option in that neighborhood

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Deserve Top Restaurante award. Excellent service and menu. I recommend for those who want experience to remember.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Very special way of representing Dutch cuisine. Everything was just perfect. The presentation, service and food.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Accommodating staff and chef, neat environment,  cool Japanese knives, good wine recommendations, but the chicken had freezer burn.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: You get a chance to try variety of dishes here, served in innovative ways. One of rare decent restaurants near the Zuid station.

Name: Bolenius
Review Text: Did not like it at all. Overly complicated flavours. A small conflict about the check could have been resolved amicably but clumsy patron turned it into a pr disaster.
